Hi! I'm a PhD student at King's College London, funded by a studentship from the [KCL MRC DTP](https://kcl-mrcdtp.com/). My area of research is the genetics of PTSD. I'm especially interested in improving phenotypic specificity in genomic research on PTSD by focusing on specific traumatic experiences and specific symptoms.

## Education

**PhD Social, Genetic & Developmental Psychiatry Research** (2024-) \| King's College London

**MRes Biomedical & Translational Sciences** (2023-2024) \| *Distinction* \| King's College London

**MSc Developmental Psychology & Psychopathology** (2022-23) \| *Distinction* \| King's College London

**BSc Psychology** (2019-22) \| *First Class Honours* \| King's College London
